nodes.bodyText: This is a nit. I think at this point, you can remove _log_full_thread_dump() and directly call thread_dump() instead.

nodes.bodyText: Thanks! I'm using _log_full_thread_dump() as a mock in the unit test. I can mock thread_dump() instead there or leave it as is. Let me know your thoughts.
